Unable to sync or back up this folder as the account has been blocked
Problem syncing or backing up this folder. Try again later. If the issue continues, contact Support.
Account reloaded. Any missed updates to your backups or syncs haven’t been applied.
Sync or backup has been stopped as you appear to have logged out of the desktop app. Log back in via the desktop app, and resume the sync or backup.
Folder in external drive can’t be located.
There’s already a synced folder at the same location
Couldn’t create a .megaignore file for this sync
Couldn’t read sync configuration. Try again later or check folder permissions.
Invalid scan interval. Check the scan interval setup and try again.
Couldn’t communicate with the folder location. Check the location is accessible and permissions for the folder location are granted.
Unable to add a file system watch. Ensure there is sufficient free space and memory, and that you have granted permissions for the folder location.
Couldn’t read sync location. Check the location is accessible and permissions for the folder location are granted.
Insufficient storage space on your device
An unknown error occurred. Contact support@mega.nz.
Folder can’t be synced or backed up as the MEGA folder is in the Rubbish bin
Folder in your device can’t be located right now. Try again later.
Folder in your device can’t be located
Problem syncing or backing up this folder because of changes to the MEGA folder. Stop the sync or backup and try setting it up again in the desktop app, or contact Support.
Problem syncing or backing up this folder. Stop the sync or backup and try setting it up again in the desktop app, or contact Support.
Folder can’t be synced as it’s already inside a synced folder
Files in this folder can’t be synced or backed up. You will need to re-enable the sync or backup from the desktop app.
Syncing paused, battery level too low. Charge battery to resume syncing.
Share large files thanks to a generous transfer quota and ensure security with password-protected links.
Rewind to restore files and folders back to any date up to 180 days, so your data is accident and tamper-proof.
A playlist with this name already exists. Enter a different name.
You may not have any apps installed which can open this website
Save all your downloaded files to “%1$s”?
Starting from %1$s %2$s, find the perfect fit for your storage needs.
The size of this folder will take your MEGA account over its storage limit. To be able to sync it, you will need to either free up some space or upgrade your MEGA account.
If you have misspelt your email address, correct it and tap [A]Resend[/A].
Syncing paused, your MEGA plan has run out of storage
Upload paused, device is not charging

Your Pro Flexi account has been deactivated due to payment failure or you’ve cancelled your subscription. You won’t be able to access the data stored in your account. \nTo make a payment and reactivate your subscription, log in to MEGA through a browser.
Uploads will be paused until you start charging your device. Uploads will still remain paused if your battery is below 20%.
Sync a folder on your device with a folder on MEGA.
This folder can’t be synced. Set it up to sync to MEGA using Camera uploads.
Plus access to these great benefits:

• MEGA VPN 
• Unrestricted calls and meetings 
• Automatically sync the folders on your mobile device 
• No advertisements
• MEGA VPN \n• Unrestricted calls and meetings \n• Automatically sync the folders on your mobile device
Security is why we exist, your files are safe with us behind a well oiled encryption machine where only you can access your files.
Fully encrypted chat with voice and video calls, group messaging and file sharing integration with your Cloud Drive.
Add contacts, create a network, collaborate, and make voice and video calls without ever leaving MEGA.
Camera uploads is an essential feature for any mobile device and we have got you covered. Sign up for an account now.
Your Camera uploads folder and secondary media uploads folder cannot be related to each other. Choose a different folder.
This device doesn’t have an app to select folders
• Automatically sync the folders on your mobile device
Use tags to help you find and organise your data. Try tagging by year, location, project, or subject.
Tags can’t contain spaces or non-alphanumeric symbols. Tags written with capital letters will be displayed in lowercase.
The maximum number of tags is %1$d
You’ll miss out on these features
You’ll still have access to these features until your MEGA plan expires, then you’ll be moved to a free account.
You are currently using %1s of storage, which you will risk losing.
This item is set to hidden. Once you share the item, anyone with the link will be able to see it. It will still be hidden in your Cloud drive.
One or more of these items is set to hidden. Once you share the hidden items, anyone with the link will be able to see them. The items will still be hidden in your Cloud drive.
Your subscription is not managed by Google
This is because you subscribed to MEGA via Apple. To cancel your subscription, you will need to:

You need to cancel your subscription using a web browser
You need to reactivate your subscription using a web browser

2. Log in to your MEGA account.

Don’t close the app. If you close, transfers not yet queued will be lost.
Backups of the previous versions of your synced files will be permanently deleted from your device. \n\nCheck the .debris folder in your local device to see if you need to restore anything.
Enquiries must be at least 10 characters
Describe the issue with at least 10 characters
All your messages, group chats, and calls are protected by our zero-knowledge encryption. [A]Learn more[/A]
With top-notch security and verification codes, reach out without fear of scams, data mining, or information theft
There are hidden items in this folder. Sharing the folder will mean that the hidden items are visible to those you share with. The items will still be hidden in your Cloud drive.
There are hidden items in one or more of these folders. Sharing the folders will mean that the hidden items are visible to those you share with. The items will still be hidden in your Cloud drive.
We’re sorry to see you leave! Can you tell us why you’re cancelling your subscription?
Your subscription will be cancelled immediately and you will be moved to a free MEGA account when your current plan expires. Note: Cancelling your subscription won’t delete your account.
Select a reason to cancel your subscription
I found my plan too expensive

I don’t want a subscription or auto-billing
I don’t need all the storage in my plan
I need features MEGA doesn’t have
I’m switching to a provider I like better
I find MEGA confusing and difficult to use
I’m not happy with the support and customer service
I needed this plan temporarily and no longer use it
I allow MEGA to contact me to talk about this topic further

Your meetings, family calls, and private conversations are protected by our zero-knowledge encryption. [A]Learn more[/A]
Message must be at least 10 characters

Meeting confirmed: Invite others to join
To keep uploading data, upgrade now to get more storage.
To keep uploading data, upgrade to get more storage.
There are hidden items in one or more of these albums. Sharing the albums will mean that the hidden items are visible to those you share with. The items will still be hidden in your Cloud drive.
Allow MEGA to access all files?
To back up your files, MEGA needs access to the files and folders on your device. Your data is always safe with us.
MEGA needs access to your device storage in order to back up your local folder. [U]Tap to grant access[/U]
Allow MEGA to access your device’s files
By allowing MEGA access to your files, you can upload to MEGA without creating temporary copies, saving space on your device and enabling faster uploads.
This will stop the sync process between the two folders but won’t remove the folders.
Sync or back up a folder on your device with a folder on MEGA
MEGA can see your meeting name and description, but we keep them private
Allow MEGA to display over other apps
MEGA needs your permission to display over apps. This means that you’ll never miss another incoming call notification.
Not enough space to upload new files
You’re over your storage quota. Upgrade to a higher plan, or free up some space, to upload new files. [A]Learn more[/A].
Search for photos, videos, and albums

resources.string: Something went wrong. Download was not cancelled.

You will be charged %1$s immediately but your subscription will not automatically renew after 12 months due to government regulations. It will be your responsibility to renew your subscription after it has expired. You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime via Subscriptions in [A]Google Play[/A]. By upgrading your account, you agree to MEGA’s [B]Terms of Service[/B] and [C]Privacy and Data Policy[/C].
